client.map.view.helpers

Class ImageLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.map.view.helpers.ImageLocation

  • public class ImageLocation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the disk location of the image files for the map.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler
